name: Cookie Crush - Amazing Match
description:
Adventure in this wonderful cookie world, you can collect colorful cookies

Enjoy the exciting and adventurous game with your cookies,challenge yourself with every interesting task.totally free to have the whole fun.

1.Free to play
2.Hundreds of levels and update every week
3.Play without internet access
4.Join the tournament with all players around the world
5.Login with facebook and play with your friends
6.All special boosters can combine with each other to make bigger one, take a try
